One intricate pattern

240 years of reimagination.

  • 1775: Pattern No. 1

    The blue fluted pattern known as 'mussel' has been our signature pattern since the beginning.

  • 1880's: A timeless pattern

    Framed in beautiful lace, Arnold Krog's evolution of the pattern is still as elegant as ever.

  • 2000: A blooming flower

    Blue Fluted Mega by Karen Kjældgård-Larsen lets the cobalt blue chrysanthemum flower bloom across the plate.

  • 2011: Blue Elements

    A bold, yet faithful remix of pattern No. 1 – by designer Louise Campbell.

  • Signed in blue

    After 240 years, every plate and pattern remains unique like the blue-painter's handwriting.

Royal Copenhagen
